File /std/shops/inherit/pawn_shop.c

This inherit is under development. Use at your own risk. All bug reports to me, please. This is an inherit for pawn shops, which buy your items from you, but also keep them for a short period of time for you to buy them back, before they go into the shop's general inventory. It is built around the general store inherit /std/shop.

Started 21st September 2002

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/shop.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/move_failures.h, /include/shops/bank.h and /include/money.h

query_pawn_ttl
int query_pawn_ttl()
This returns the time to live of pawned items, in seconds. That is, the length of time between an item's being pawned and the shop selling that item to recoup its costs.

Returns:
[int] The time in seconds before the shop will sell a pawned item.
set_language
void set_language(string lang)
This sets the language that the shop will use for receipts.

Parameters:
lang - The language to write receipts in.
set_pawn_markup
void set_pawn_markup(int percent)
This sets the percentage that the shop will mark reclaim prices up by. The default is 20%.

Parameters:
percent - The percentage to add to reclaim prices.
set_pawn_mess
void set_pawn_mess(mixed mess)
This sets the message given out when somebody pawns something.

Parameters:
mess - The message given when something is successfully pawned.
set_pawn_ttl
void set_pawn_ttl(int ttl)
This sets the time to live of pawned items, in seconds. That is, the length of time between an item being pawned and the shop selling that item to recoup its costs. The default is one week realtime.

Parameters:
ttl - The time in seconds before the shop will sell a pawned item.
